3D Printing

Our mission: At Icon Industries, our mission is to provide UK customers with a reliable, affordable, and high-quality 3D printing experience built to last.

3D Models

At ICON Industries, we use advanced FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) printers to turn your ideas into physical reality. These printers build models layer by layer using thermoplastic filament, guided by a precise set of instructions known as G-code.

When you send us an .stl file, our slicing software converts it into G-code — allowing our machines to print your design with accuracy and care.

Sustainability

We take sustainability seriously.
Our printers run PLA filament — a biodegradable material made from corn starch, not fossil fuels. It’s safer for the planet and still delivers strong, clean prints.

We carefully tune our temperatures for each job to balance high-quality results with energy efficiency. Every step of the process is designed with both your expectations and the environment in mind.

Have sustainability questions?
Feel free to reach out at
sustainability3D@iconindustries.co.uk

Print Policy

We reserve the right to refuse any model submissions that are offensive, dangerous, or otherwise inappropriate. If in doubt — ask us first.

Layer Resolution: 0.05 – 0.4 mm

Frequently Asked Questions

We accept .stl, .obj, and .3mf files. For best results, please provide watertight models without errors.

Print times vary depending on size and complexity — typically between 1 hour to 24 hours. We'll provide an estimated turnaround time with your quote.

What materials do you use?

We ship across the UK using reliable couriers. Shipping costs are calculated based on package size and destination.
